post.summary: Return wobjects which user is following

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check for following in wobjects

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: user name what objects needs to return

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**locale** - which locale need to choose field of each wobject(*'en-US' by default*), 
**limit** - limit of returned objects*(by default - 50)*, 
**skip** - skip some objects to return(params for infinite scroll, *by default - 0*)

get.summary: Return users which user is following

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: user name which followings needs to return

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Count users to skip(infinite scroll)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Count of users to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: How to sort users. Valid: rank, alphabet, followers, recency. Default: rank

parameters.name: following
parameters.description: name of user who make request to check founded users in his followings

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: name of user who make request to check founded users in his followers

post.description: Get list posts depends on user followings (on users and wobjects)

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio wobject and posts moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check following

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: user name what feed needs to return

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - limit of returned posts*(by default - 20)*, 
**user_languages** - array of languages to return feed
----------------Infinite scroll---------------
*For infinite scroll, use **skip** or **lastId** param, preferably **lastId** *
**skip** - count of skipping posts*(by default - 0)*,
**lastId** - *_id* of last retrieved post

post.summary: Return all wobjects in which user has weight

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check for following in wobjects

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: user name what objects needs to return

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - limit of returned wobjects(for infinite scroll)*(by default - 30)*, 
**skip** - count of skipping wobjects(for infinite scroll)*(by default - 0)*,
**locale** - locale which wobjects fields need to return,
**object_types** -types of objects to return,
**exclude_object_types** - which types esclude from list to return,

post.summary: Return user Blog(user authored and resteemed posts)

parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check for following

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: user name which blog needs to return

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - count of posts to return(for infinite scroll)*(by default - 20)*,
**skip** - count of posts to skip(need for infinite scroll)*(by default - 0)*,
**start_author** - for steem user blog feed(for infinite scroll),
**start_permlink** - for steem user blog feed(for infinite scroll).

post.summary: Return list of waivio objects, all or by specified author_permlink(author_permlink)

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - limit of returned wobjects(by default - 30),
**skip** - count of skipping wobjects(for infinite scroll, default 0),
**user_limit** - count of users to show(by default 5), 
**locale** - locale of fields(by default - *en-US*.), 
**author_permlinks** - return wobjects by specified author_permlinks,
**object_types** - list object types with witch objects to returning,
**exclude_object_types** - list object types without witch objects to returning, (if use **object_types** then ignore **exclude_object_types**)
**required_fields** - which fields add to returning objects,
**sample** - boolean flag, to return only 5 from top 100 wobjects
**map** - object with coordinates and radius, need to display restaurants at map. Map includes property coordinates - it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude]

200.description:
**hasMore** - Boolean flag of of existing more wobjects,
**wobjects** - array of Waivio objects

get.summary: Return info about specified waivio object

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check for following in wobjects

parameters.name: authorPermlink
parameters.description: author_permlink of object to return

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: name of user< to show campaigns on list objects

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Read locale of user(default en-EN)

parameters.name: required_fields
parameters.description: Additional fields which (not includes in REQUIRED FIELDS on waivio) to return with wobject

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject and posts moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check for following

parameters.name: authorPermlink
parameters.description: author_permlink of object to return posts

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - Count of posts to return (*default* 30),
**user_languages** - array of lanugages to filter result posts

----------------Infinite scroll---------------
*For infinite scroll, use **skip** or **lastId** param, preferably **lastId** *
**skip** - count of skipping posts*(by default - 0)*,
**lastId** - *_id* of last retrieved post

parameters.name: authorPermlink
parameters.description: author_permlink of specified wobject

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: limit - count of followers to return(default 30), skip - count of followers that need to skip(for infinite scroll)

parameters.description: name of user who make request to check founded users in his followings

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: name of user who make request to check founded users in his followers

post.summary: Return all users which has weight in current wobject

parameters.name: authorPermlink
parameters.description: author_permlink of specified wobject

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - Count of users to return (*default* 5), 
**skip** - count of skipping users(*default* 5), use for infinite scroll,
**user** - UserName, which weight add to response

parameters.name: following
parameters.description: name of user who make request to check founded users in his followings

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: name of user who make request to check founded users in his followers

post.summary: Search objects by prefix of "name" field

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**search_string** - pattern for search wobjects, 
**object_type** - filter to search only specified type,
**locale** - locale for end formatting wobject fields(by default - en-US), 
**limit** - limit of returned wobjects,
**skip** - count of skipping wobjects,
**sortByApp** - change priority for cruical wobjects by specified App,
**required_fields** - array of filds to include in result wobjects

post.summary: Return feed of all wobjects togetger

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - Count of posts to return (*default* 30), 
**skip** - Count of skipping posts infinite scroll(*optional*)

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: Name of field

parameters.name: fieldBody
parameters.description: Value of field

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check for following

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Author of post

parameters.name: permlink
parameters.description: Permlink of post

get.summary: Return post comments and other details. Comments placed at "content" key of result object.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Author of post

parameters.name: permlink
parameters.description: Permlink of post

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category of post, aka parent_permlink

post.summary: Return list of posts by some category(trending, hot, created, blog)

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject and posts moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check for following

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - Count of posts to return (*default* 30),
**category** - Category of posts(trending, created, hot, blog, promoted).

----------------Infinite scroll---------------
For infinite scroll, use **skip** or **lastId** param, for 'trending' and 'hot' - use **skip**, for 'created' - preferably **lastId**
**skip** - count of skipping posts*(by default - 0)*,
**lastId** - *_id* of last retrieved post

post.summary: Return list of posts by authors and permlinks

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: Array of authors and permlinks

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - Count of object_typs to return (*default* 30),
**skip** - Count of skipping object_type(for infinite scroll),
**wobjects_count** - Count of related wobjects to return(default 3)

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of Object Type

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**simplified** - boolean flag for simply result for map
**userName** - name of user, who make request
**wobjects_count** - Count of wobjects to return (*default* 30),
**wobjects_skip** - Count of skipping object(for infinite scroll),
**filter** - advanced filter for *wobjects* current *Object Type*,
**filter.map** - composite param, to find wobjects in radius
**filter.map.coordinates** - coordinates of point to search([**latitude, longitude**])
**filter.map.radius** - radius around of point to search(**meters**)
**sort** - Sort by "weight" or "proximity" *(if use proximity, require to use **map** filter)*

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of Object Type

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Count of experts to skip, (default 0)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Count of experts to return, (default 5)

post.summary: Search by name on Object Types

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**search_string** - Name or part of name Object Type
**limit** - Count of object_typs to return (*default* 30),
**skip** - Count of skipping object_type(for infinite scroll), *required*

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**string** - String to search
**userLimit** - Count of users to return (*default* 20),
**wobjectsLimit** - Count of wobjects to return (*default* 20),
**objectsTypeLimit** - Count of object types to return (*default* 20),
**sortByApp** - Change priority of returning wobjects by cruical to specified App
 **user** - User name for check his followings

parameters.name: following
parameters.description: name of user who make request to check founded users in his followings

parameters.name: follower

parameters.name: app

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**file** - Image file in form data, or
 **imageUrl** - link to exists image

200.description: successful operation, link to uploaded image

parameters.description: Name of registered "App" on waivio
